content: We now have the #Editors & UIs> channel -- are you all interested in combining this channel into there (I think there's value in each of us seeing what's happening with other editor environments and getting ideas from each other, which is why I subscribe here, but it'd be even easier if we were all there I think)
I think that it makes sense. Also, we should probably find another maintainer for the lean mode. I was failing to find time for this for months.
